definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: The import of petroleum in modern Zhejiang is decided by two factors, an exterior one and an interior one.
sentences.chinese: 近代浙江的洋油進口主要出於外部和內部兩個因素。

sentences.english: Gone are the days when we used foreign oil.
sentences.chinese: 咱們利用洋油的日子一去不復返了。

sentences.english: As gas consumers, cars can make a nation dependent on foreign oil.
sentences.chinese: 汽車作爲汽油消耗者會使一個國家依賴洋油。
我們用“洋油”的日子一去不復返了。

sentences.english: Gone are the days forever when we used foreign oil.
sentences.chinese: 我們使用洋油的日子一去不復返了。

sentences.english: The days when the Chinese people had to rely on imported oil are gone forever.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民依靠洋油的日子已經一去不復返了。

sentences.english: The days are gone forever when we used "foreign oil".
sentences.chinese: 我們使用“洋油”的日子一去不復返了。

sentences.english: Gone are the days when we used the foreign oil.
sentences.chinese: 我們用洋油的日子一去不返了。

definition: tung oil, from the Japanese wood-oil tree Aleurites cordata, used in making lacquer
needle and thread/sewing implements/needlework/(fig.) unimportant thing
